title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 268.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 268.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part shall be construed and applied to promote its
underlying purpose of protecting the public health by requiring that food
products containing nitrous oxide which are offered for sale directly to
consumers be offered for sale in tamper-evident packaging. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
268.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
